# automatic

**Type Property**

Use the a dismissal behavior that’s appropriate for the given context.

## Declaration

```swift
static let automatic: MenuActionDismissBehavior
```

## Discussion

In most cases, the default behavior is [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/MenuActionDismissBehavior/enabled]. There are some cases, like [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Stepper], that use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/MenuActionDismissBehavior/disabled] by default.

## Getting dismiss behaviors

- **disabled**: Never dismiss the presented menu after performing an action.
- **enabled**: Always dismiss the presented menu after performing an action.
